name: Droidrun
description:
An Alligator had broken into the company and is up to you to chase him down!

Controls:

In-Screen ButtonsMobile original controlUp ArrowJump ButtonDown ArrowCrouch Button, or Fall while jumpingRight Arrow or SpaceAttack and Press OK

The game has a total of 5 levels and a secret one, ENJOY!

Comments and Feedback are really welcome! I want to improve my skills and grow!
